title: Email Generator
prompt:
Create a contact list with first names and last names for 5 people:

1. John Smith
2. Sarah Johnson
3. Michael Brown
4. Emily Davis
5. David Wilson

Generate email addresses in the format: firstname.lastname@company.com
Use text formulas to:
- Convert names to lowercase
- Concatenate first name, dot, last name, and domain

All email addresses should use formulas, not hard-coded values.
